title: 110 - Eve Rickert & Franklin Veaux (Polyamory Experts)
description:
Eve and Franklin wrote More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory. You can learn  more about them and their book at their site: http://www.morethantwo.com/



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
